hero.title: Dragon Language Translator for Dovahzul

tool.noInput: Please enter some text to translate.

whatIs.title: What is Dragon Language Translator
whatIs.description: Dragon Language Translator is a specialized tool designed to convert Dovahzul—the ancient dragon tongue from The Elder Scrolls universe—into English and vice versa. Built on the canonical 34-rune alphabet and expanded community lexicon of 700+ words, this translator decodes draconic scripts with linguistic precision. Whether you're a Skyrim fan crafting immersive roleplay dialogues, a fantasy writer seeking authentic dragon speech, or a lore enthusiast exploring Thu'um shouts, Dragon Language Translator bridges the gap between mortal and draconic communication.

examples.title: Sample Translations in Dragon Language
examples.description: Discover authentic Dovahzul translations from The Elder Scrolls lore. These examples showcase iconic Thu'um shouts, common dragon phrases, and essential vocabulary used by the Dov. Each translation follows canonical grammar rules and demonstrates how dragons communicate power, wisdom, and ancient knowledge through their distinctive linguistic patterns.

items.alt: Fus Ro Dah - Unrelenting Force shout translation showing Force Balance Push in English
items.name: Fus Ro Dah → Force Balance Push

items.alt: Zu'u los dovahkiin - I am dragonborn translation demonstrating first-person dragon grammar
items.name: Zu'u los dovahkiin → I am dragonborn

items.alt: Lok Vah Koor - Sky Spring Summer showing Clear Sky shout word-by-word translation
items.name: Lok Vah Koor → Sky Spring Summer (Clear Sky)

items.alt: Pruzah wundun - Good journey farewell phrase translation in dragon language etiquette
items.name: Pruzah wundun → Good journey (Farewell)

items.alt: Dovahkiin fen kos bonaar - Dragonborn will be humble prophecy translation showing future tense
items.name: Dovahkiin fen kos bonaar → Dragonborn will be humble

items.alt: Yol Toor Shul - Fire Inferno Sun showing Fire Breath shout with Thu'um power words
items.name: Yol Toor Shul → Fire Inferno Sun (Fire Breath)

howto.title: How to Translate Dovahzul to English
howto.description: Follow these simple steps to translate Dovahzul using our efficient tool.

steps.name: Input Text
steps.description: Carefully type the text you want to translate into the input field. Double-check for spelling accuracy to ensure precise translation. Avoid special characters and use plain language. Confirm your entry before proceeding to the next step.

steps.name: Detect Language
steps.description: Begin by analyzing the text's structure and vocabulary. Identify unique characters, words, or patterns specific to the dragon language. Compare these elements with known language data to determine if the text matches dragon language features accurately.

steps.name: Choose Mode
steps.description: Select your preferred translation mode by clicking on the dropdown menu. Choose between 'Basic' for simple phrases or 'Advanced' for complex sentences. Ensure your selection matches your translation needs before proceeding to the next step.

steps.name: Receive Translation
steps.description: After submitting your text for translation, wait for the system to process. The translated content will appear in the designated output area. Ensure your internet connection is stable to receive the translation promptly without interruptions.

howto.imageAlt: How to use dragon language translator

items.title: Community-Expanded Dragon Lexicon
items.description: VibeTrans captures the magic of dragon language, originally crafted with only 34 runes and no punctuation. Community creativity added over 700 non-canon words, expanding the dragon lexicon even further.

items.title: The 34 Sacred Runes of Dovahzul
items.description: Bethesda's dragon language uses just 34 unique runes and no punctuation, with community expansion adding over 700 unofficial words, making VibeTrans the perfect tool for decoding draconic dialogues.

items.title: Learning Pathways
items.description: Unlock the mystical world of dragons with VibeTrans. Our unique pathways guide you from novice to master, blending ancient lore with modern tech. Whether you're decoding scrolls or just curious, seize the chance to transform your learning journey into an epic saga.

items.title: Community Contributions
items.description: Dive into the vibrant world of VibeTrans, where every user can leave their mark. Whether you're decoding ancient dragon scripts or creating quirky dialects, your input fuels our growth. Join forces with fellow enthusiasts and watch as your translations transform the way we communicate.

items.title: Downloadable Resources
items.description: Explore VibeTrans's cache of downloadable goodies, from intricate dragon scripts to quirky language cheat sheets. Tailored for the curious linguist, these resources offer a treasure trove of insights. Dive in and give your dragon language skills a boost with just a click. Discover the magic today!

items.title: Grammar Insights
items.description: Ever wondered if dragons use slang or if their verbs breathe fire? VibeTrans cracks the code of dragon syntax, revealing quirky twists like 'scalespeak' and 'winged whispers.' Dive into linguistic lore and discover the rhythm behind each fiery roar. It's grammar with a mythical twist!

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Have other questions? Feel free to contact us via email.

item-1.question: Is this dragon language translator free?
item-1.answer: The dragon language translator is completely free to use. You can access all features without any cost or hidden fees. Simply visit the website, enter your text, and receive instant translations without any financial commitment.

item-2.question: How is my privacy protected?
item-2.answer: Your privacy is safeguarded through encryption and strict data policies. We ensure that all personal data is encrypted during transmission and storage. Access to data is limited to authorized personnel only, and regular audits are conducted to maintain security standards.

item-4.question: What is Dragon Language Translator?
item-4.answer: Dragon Language Translator is a tool designed to convert text between human languages and the fictional dragon language. It allows enthusiasts to explore and understand dragon dialects by inputting phrases and receiving translations, enhancing their fantasy language experience.
